name: Banco Popular Español
bossPosition: Managing Director. Head of External and Corporate Relations
goal:
Banco Popular es la entidad financiera española más orientada a la banca minorista. Tiene además una amplia presencia internacional con dos entidades Banco Popular Portugal y Totalbank en Florida.
La estrategia corporativa de Banco Popular descansa sobre los pilares de rentabilidad, solvencia y eficiencia dentro de un modelo de negocio centrado en el cliente y la alta calidad del servicio, siendo entidad de referencia para pequeñas y medianas empresas.
interests: Competition, Consumer Affairs, Economic and Financial Affairs, Enlargement, Enterprise, External Relations, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, General and Institutional Affairs, Internal Market
euInitiatives:
Our follow-up exercise covers EU regulatory initiatives in the field of financial services:
-Financial Markets: Capital Markets Union, Financial Products, Shadow Banking…
-Capital & TBTF: Bank Structure Reform, Resolution Framework & LAC, Capital and Leverage, ECB as supervisor
-Retail banking: Payments, Consumer Protection
-Long Term Investment: Capital Markets Union, SME Access to Finance…

As well as other EU initiatives of interest for Banco Popular, for example in the area of prudential requirements CRR/CRD, Competition and Innovation among others.
